search.query: | savedsearch telegraf-os-windows | sort 0 host | table host
| savedsearch telegraf-os-Host_Search_windows $host$
| savedsearch telegraf-os-Context_Chart_CPU_Search_windows $host$ | rename pct_used as "avg % cpu"
| savedsearch telegraf-os-Context_Chart_Memory_Search_windows $host$ | rename pct_used as "avg % mem"
| savedsearch telegraf-os-Context_Chart_Disk_Usage_Search_windows $host$ | rename pct_used as "% disk used"

| mstats avg(_value) as Percent_Idle where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_Idle_Time" instance=_Total $host$ span=1s | eval cpu_usage=100-Percent_Idle | timechart `telegraf_span` max(cpu_usage) AS "max cpu load %", avg(cpu_usage) AS "avg cpu load %"

| mstats avg(_value) as Available_Bytes where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_mem.Available_Bytes" $host$ span=1s | eval Available_Bytes = Available_Bytes/1048567 | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(Available_Bytes) as Available_Bytes | append [ | mstats avg(_value) as used_percent where `telegraf_index` metric_name=mem.used_percent $host$ by metric_name span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(used_percent) AS "mem used (%)" ]

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_diskio.Disk_Write_Bytes_persec OR metric_name=win_diskio.Disk_Read_Bytes_persec $host$ by metric_name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(win_diskio.*) as "*" by _time | eval Disk_Write_Bytes_persec=(Disk_Write_Bytes_persec/10000000), Disk_Read_Bytes_persec=(Disk_Read_Bytes_persec/10000000) | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(Disk_Write_Bytes_persec) as write_bytes, avg(Disk_Read_Bytes_persec) as read_bytes

| mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_disk.Percent_Free_Space OR metric_name=win_disk.Free_Megabytes $host$ by metric_name, instance | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(win_disk.*) as "*" by instance | eval used_pct=round(100-Percent_Free_Space, 2), "disk total (GB)"=round((Free_Megabytes/Percent_Free_Space)*100/1024, 2) | fields instance, "disk total (GB)", used_pct | sort 0 instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Bytes_Received_persec OR metric_name=win_net.Bytes_Sent_persec host=* by metric_name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(win_net.*) as "*" by _time | rename Bytes_Received_persec as inbound, Bytes_Sent_persec as outbound | foreach inbound, outbound [ eval <<FIELD>> = '<<FIELD>>'/1024 ] | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(inbound) as inbound, avg(outbound) as outbound | eval outbound = "-" . outbound

| mstats avg(_value) as Context_Switches_persec where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_system.Context_Switches_persec" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(Context_Switches_persec) as Context_Switches_persec
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_User_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "user_time %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_Processor_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "processor_time %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_Privileged_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "privileged_time %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_Interrupt_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "interrupt_time %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_Idle_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "idle_time %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_cpu.Percent_DPC_Time" $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "dpc_time %"

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=mem.used OR metric_name=mem.total $host$ by metric_name span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(mem.*) as "mem.*" by _time | eval mem.free=('mem.total'-'mem.used') | foreach mem.* [ eval <<FIELD>> = '<<FIELD>>'/1073741824 ] | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(mem.*) AS "*" | where isnotnull(total)
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_swap.Percent_Usage $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "paging file usage %"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_mem.Pages_persec $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "Pages/sec"
| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_mem.Page_Faults_persec $host$ span=1s | timechart `telegraf_span` avg(value) AS "Page faults per sec"

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_diskio.Current_Disk_Queue_Length $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as queue_length by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Disk_Reads_persec" $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as reads_persec by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Disk_Writes_persec" $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as write_persec by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Disk_Read_Bytes_persec" $host$ by instance span=1s | eval value=(value/10000000) | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as read_bytes_persec by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Percent_Disk_Read_Time" $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as read_time by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Disk_Write_Bytes_persec" $host$ by instance span=1s | eval value=(value/10000000) | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as write_bytes_persec by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name="win_diskio.Percent_Disk_Write_Time" $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as write_time by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Bytes_Received_persec $host$ by instance span=1s | eval value=value/1024 | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as inbound by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Received_persec $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as packets_recv by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Bytes_Sent_persec $host$ by instance span=1s | eval value=value/1024 | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(value) as outbound by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Sent_persec $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as packets_recv by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Received_Errors $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as err_in by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Outbound_Errors $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as err_out by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Received_Discarded $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as drop_in by instance

| mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_net.Packets_Outbound_Discarded $host$ by instance span=1s | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` sum(value) as drop_out by instance

| mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_disk.Percent_Free_Space $host$ by instance span=1s | eval used_percent=(100-value) | timechart useother=f limit=45 `telegraf_span` avg(used_percent) as used_percent by instance

| mstats latest(_value) as uptime where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_system.System_Up_Time $host$ | eval now=now() | sort host | eval "Date of last system startup (mm/dd/Y HH:MM)"=strftime((now()-uptime), "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M") | eval "uptime (human duration)"=tostring(uptime, "duration") | fields uptime,"uptime (human duration)","Date of last system startup (mm/dd/Y HH:MM)" | rename uptime AS "uptime (in seconds)"
fields "Date of last system startup (mm/dd/Y HH:MM)"
fields "uptime (human duration)"
| mstats latest(_value) as uptime where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_system.System_Up_Time $host$ span=1m | eval uptime=(uptime/86400) | timechart `telegraf_span` latest(uptime) as uptime

chart.title: Storage usage (GB) prediction for next 3 months

search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=win_disk.Percent_Free_Space OR metric_name=win_disk.Free_Megabytes $host$ by metric_name, instance span=1d | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(win_disk.*) as "*" by _time, instance | eval Percent_Free_Space=round(Percent_Free_Space, 2), disk.total=(Free_Megabytes/Percent_Free_Space)*100, disk.used='disk.total'-Free_Megabytes | stats sum(disk.used) as used, sum(disk.total) as total by _time | eval used=(used/1024), total=(total/1024) | timechart span="1d" perc95(used) AS storage_used latest(total) as total | predict storage_used As predict algorithm=LLP5 holdback=0 future_timespan=120 | filldown total | foreach * [ eval <<FIELD>> = round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ]
